commit message: * Added support for hosts that don't require authentication.
* Only release wakelock if we have it acquired. Reference Issue 37

* First pass at publickey authentication.
* RSA and DSA keys can be generated (not imported yet).
* RSA and DSA keys can be copied to the clipboard and deleted.
* Encrypted keys are not tried right now, only unencrypted.
* Restore Marcus's name (Jeffrey, fix your editor!)
* Fix a typo in the EULA.

* Allow scrolling in Pubkey Generator Activity until we get landscape orientation looking better.
* Don't drop and recreate HostDatabase on every new version.
* Remove some unused pubkey helper functions debug statements.
* Fix a typo in debug stateent.
* Add ports to the end of nicknames created for hosts added by quick-connect with non-default ports.
* Fix breaking out of scroll regions when the line wraps.

* Fix scrolling region setting bug.
* Ignore xterm-style title updates (we could use this for the TerminalManager title, actually).

* Fix delete line bug in emulation that was messing up irssi clock updates.
* Remove some debugging statements that snuck into the code.
* Fix bug introduced that makes lines scroll too much. I think the last two revisions fix the real bug that this was covering up.

Okay, you're not going to believe this:
* Fixed yet another error with scroll regions; this time with cursor movement into them.
* Fix crash if user tries to type during authentication.

* Add icons for PubkeyListActivity and an empty-list hint TextView
* Make sure setMargins in terminal emulation can't be fooled
* Don't force ConsoleActivity to run in landscape orientation

* Added automatic version number insertion via Ant
* Removed unused cruft
* Changed Class to Object in PromptHelper.java

* Added patch from Issue 61. Thanks, armooo.
* Corrected some character drawing weirdness. Looks much closer to a real terminal now.
* Close pubkey cursor when we're done with it instead of having Android complain about it.
* Allow users to change password for pubkey entries.

* Convert PubkeyListActivity to use a ViewBinder instead of a custom CursorAdapter
* Convert PubkeyListActivity's icons to image states
* Fix typo from last checkin.

* Allow hosts to specify which pubkey to use
* Password-protected pubkeys now supported
* Fix some dangling database pointers
* Allow users to force screen size to specific dimensions.

* added 'in-memory' function to backend service so that unlocked keys can be stored there.  this is also disable-able from settings
* 'use any key' for a host will only look through unlocked in-memory keys
* implemented 'load on start' functionality in backend service
* implemented 'import key' which lets you select any openssh-formatted key (including passworded-ones) from simple /sdcard browser
* cleaned up context menu in pubkeylist, now includes toggle checkbox for 'load at start' but only available when password-less and non-imported
* clicking a key in pubkeylist will toggle its backend status (decrypt and put in memory, or remove from memory)
* created preference for screen orientation forcing versus auto, but still need to test
* created preference for camera button behavior, but still need to test
* oops, forgot this newly added res file

* fixed bug where we might try loading passworded keys on startup in background service
* changed updatehelper so that user preference can change between daily/weekly/never frequency

* Don't repeat a notification if it's the same as the last one.
* Allow users to copy to the end of the screen.
* Strip blank space off the end of each copied line and don't append a return on the last line.
* Update manifest for version 1.2 release

* Add port forward list activity so port forwards can be saved in database
* Start saved port forwards when host is connected
* Add titles to activities to distinguish where user is

* Allow changing tunnels on connected hosts
* 'Port forwards' menu item in ConsoleActivity goes to PortForwardListActivity now
* Allow users to delete tunnels
* Add dynamic port forwarding.

* Delete unused methods in JSOCKS library.
* Replace keyboard picture with JPEG.

* Changed port forward type selector to spinner.
* Allow live disabling and enabling of ports by clicking on PortForwardList.

* Allow user to have a port-forward-only connection to a host (similar to OpenSSH's -N option)
* Fixed bug with adding port forwards
* Fixed bug where we crash if connection goes away while we're initializing the ConsoleActivity

* Don't present SD card dialog if SD card isn't present
* Sort SD card files in natural order
* Don't show view flip animation if we're the last console
* Add preference to disable status bar (full-screen)
* Fix some layout fitting problems

* Deleted JCTerm source from repository
* Externalized some strings.
* Support PINE's style of highlighting menu items with SGR italics
* ctrl-space will now send ASCII 0 (NUL)
* Add compression option to hosts

* Fix crash if you tried to bring up menu when making a shortcut on the desktop
* Fix CTRL keys so CTRL-\, et al., are supported.
* Fix bug where scroll regions were blown away when you exited the console activity and came back.

* Convert host entries to beans
* We no longer lose connections to hosts not in the database made from shortcuts
* Fix post-login automatiion that was broken with the bean patch
* Restore compression option.
* Add rudimentary help system.

* Refactor a bit of the help screen
* Don't close view when host disconnects (user must explicitly close now)

* Handle not-yet-connected hosts correctly
* Fix annoying pre-connection row movement bug when resizing to a larger number of rows.

* Fix disconnect prompt when in port orientation
* Fix answerback to send back current terminal emulation mode
* Abstract beans to allow serialization into XML
* Fix size of 'dimmed' area for prompts.
Catch when our remote shell is killed.

* Respond to channel EOF instead of exit status.
* Make ESC-c clear the buffer like other terminal emulators.
Add a hint about what to do when Host List is empty.
Only prompt user whether to close session when remote side closed it.
Change things from public and protected to protected and private where they should be (being private helps with dead code detection in Eclipse)
Convert Pubkey handling to PubkeyBean in preparation for backup/restore functionality
Fix typo in last commit
Continued pubkey bean conversion
Added preference for Wi-Fi locking
Display the reason a connection couldn't be made if connection fails before authentication.
Only lock Wi-Fi if our active network is Wi-Fi upon connection
Wrap local output lines before we connect
Duplicate ESC-c reset functionality in vt320.reset() (perhaps should be inlined)

* Only release Wi-Fi lock when it's held (darn you, inaccurate SDK documentation)
* Stop service immediately if ConnectBot is exited with no connected hosts if there are no loaded pubkeys, OR
* Stop service after timeout if there are loaded pubkeys
* Make sure we catch rebinds to cancel timer
* Fix inverted logic in loading pubkeys
Only react to the slash and tab keys on keyUp and don't print anything if it was used as a modifier
Output algorithm during connection.
Add in xterm-style 256 color support

* Support more xterm attributes ESC [90m - 97m and 100m - 107m
* Move onus of color tracking to VDUDisplay implementors
* Fix some indentation to match mud.de style
* Add color resets to 'ESC c' functionality
Add extra bit for default color support

Add (limited) support for switching encodings on host connections; a more radical change is needed to be fully Unicode.
* This only supports Unicode characters that can be precomposed for now (e.g., no combining marks or other zero-width characters) which will break a lot of languages.
* This does not support full-width characters (e.g., Asian languages)

* fresh check-out build fix
* Various cosmetic bugs with pubkeys
* Prepare for private key export
Allow unencrypted export of private keys in PKCS#8 format

TERM settings update
* default will be 'xterm-color' for new hosts
* add option of xterm-256color for 256 color support
Change secret key encryption algorithm to be more secure

* Added 'bumpy arrows' so that arrow keys trigger vibration, useful for laggy connections.  Also added preference to turn off if desired.
* Created windowNoTitle style to prevent brief flashing of title bar on ConsoleActivity, instead of requesting programatically.
* Slight padding change to EULA screen.
oops, disabled the build.xml update-version for my local build but was caught in last submit, reverting

* Fixed bug where irssi somehow shows black-on-black text.  I think it's using some other formatting flag that we don't recognize, but this corrects it for now.

This might break other apps that intentionally hide something using black-on-black?

Correctly handle bold black foreground on black background
* We were interpreting bold as being really bold, but it should just be a brighter ANSI color
* We're now fake bolding all text, but we should just increase the brightness of the colors

Disable DEC special characters for now
* It appears that DEC special characters were enabled when they shouldn't be
* Specification for VT emulation should be reviewed to determine when to enable
* Precomposed Unicode characters should work better now

Terminal emulation fixes
* Only display DEC special graphics when it's in the correct range (GL only)
* Make sure terminal reset is consistent
* Change the default graphics set to be compliant with ANSI level 1 (all ASCII, basically) instead of 0
Restore DEC special for GR sets as well
Fix race condition when writing to local pre-connection buffer.
Only remove bridge after we get an answer from the user if applicable
Allow hosts to be disconnected/closed once you have a dead session.

Workaround for ViewAnimator bug
* Was causing the last still-connected hosts to not show the correct options menu after a preceeding connection was closed.
Minor capitalization fix
A smaller fix to the ViewFlipper bug
Bounds checking
Handling for incomplete UTF-8 byte sequences

Some call optimizations to make terminal emulation faster
* Instead of making a String and then breaking it down again, pass in our Character array
* Don't bother checking the type of a Character below or equal to 0x7F because it's ASCII
* We don't always need to know the bottom and top margins, so only call getTopMargin() or getBottomMargin() when we do
Scroll to bottom of window on keyboard input
Fill inserted lines with space character
Fill deleted last line with space character
Display version information on top of Help activity until we can get dynamic content in our WebView.
Hack to disable volume key beeps.
Fix strange bug where single quote was stripped out of preference label
Get rid of ant-contrib.jar
Don't allow fonts to be zero or negative sizes.
Move drawing into UI thread instead of SSH receiver thread

Bug scrub
* Try to be better about unsynchronized accesses
* Don't expose references to arrays in our beans
* Make sure we don't dereference null pointers
* Update version string before calling aapt
Fix preference use bug

Allow PromptHelper to be preempted
* e.g., if a host disconnects during password authentication, it immediately closes the password prompt
Allow use of directional pad to select area of text to copy to clipboard
Don't try to clone() null values
Allow the fine-tuning of touch selection with directional pad

Indentation cleanup, pass 1
* Change 4-spaces to tabs (I blame Eclipse's editor)
* Remove white spaces from end of lines

Comply with RFC 4254 on window-change packet
* Always send false for 'want reply'
* We don't need to wait since a reply should not be sent.
* Allow the sending of (informational) pixel dimensions.
Visual indication of cursor state
Make input status indicators more easily discernible

Allow shift- and alt-lock states (untested since emulator doesn't send shift or alt key codes)
* 1st press toggles on for next key, 2nd press locks, 3rd press turns off meta state
* Different cursor indicators for each roughly equivalent to standard Android
* Move Relay to subclass to reduce indent madness
Code cleanup, pass 2

Bitmap and notifications bug fix
* Try to free bitmaps immediately to avoid running afoul of the memory limits
* Don't display the screen size of orientation changes if we're exiting the activity
Fix scrolling bug when at the bottom and bottomMargin is set
Escape URI parts when sent around via Intent extras
Fix crash if you scroll back while connecting and undo meta state alteration for pressing enter
Updating version number for 1.3 release.
